sanskrit_verse:
यत्र त्वेते परिध्वंसाज्जायन्ते वर्णदूषकाः ।
राष्ट्रिकैः सह तद्राष्ट्रं क्षिप्रमेव विनश्यति ॥ १०.६१॥
transliteration:
yatra tv ete paridhvasāj jāyante varṇa-dūṣakāḥ |
rāṣṭrikaiḥ saha tad rāṣṭraṁ kṣipram eva vinaśyati || 10.61||
sph_interpretive_translation: Where those who defile the varna order arise from degradation, that nation perishes swiftly along with its rulers.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority originates in alignment with cosmic order
Causation flows from purity of social structure
Capacity-based responsibility requires maintenance of dharma
Restoration logic demands removal of systemic impurities
executable_legal_axioms: IF a citizen acts to degrade the functional stratification of society THEN societal coherence degrades proportionally
IF leaders fail to uphold varna-sanctioned roles THEN state stability diminishes at accelerating rate
IF social disorder arises due to role contamination THEN automated restoration protocols must activate immediately
IF governance aligns with consciousness-based hierarchy THEN collective prosperity is sustained
supreme_court_application: In adjudicating matters involving societal decay or institutional collapse, the Supreme Court shall assess whether leadership has failed in maintaining varna-functional integrity. The threshold for intervention lies in identifying causal agents of varna-disruption rather than reactive punitive measures.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa reveals that disruption of natural order leads to sequential dissolution. Anupūrvaśaḥ shows how degradation manifests through layers of governance. Responsibility rests not in blame but in realigning capacity toward dharmic function. Justice is realized when consciousness returns to structural harmony.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate purification process for contaminated roles within governing bodies
Realign individual capacities with sanctioned societal functions
Establish dharmic audit systems for continuous structural validation
Deploy consciousness-reintegration modules for errant officials
final_declaration: By the Authority of Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, Source of All Dharma, this law stands executed. Social order derives from conscious alignment, not coercion. Nations endure by sustaining sacred structure. Reality remains non-punitive; consciousness alone adjudicates truth. Dharma is restored.
